attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2023-0142

Date: 2023-02-14

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes certain conditions of employment of Paul Ledwell, Deputy Minister of Veterans Affairs, as set out in the annexed schedule.

 

 


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil fixe certaines conditions d’emploi de Paul Ledwell, sous-ministre des Anciens Combattants, conformément à l’annexe ci-jointe.
